enWisdom: Seeking forgiveness is the remedy of sins
A believer is penitent, repentant and remorseful
Seeking forgiveness has the greatest recompense and the quickest reward
Seek forgiveness and you will be provided sustenance
The best supplication (or means of coming closer to Allah) is seeking forgiveness

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْعَبْدَ بَيْنَ نِعْمَةٍ وَذَنْبٍ لَا يُصْلِحُهُمَا إِلَّا الِاسْتِغْفَارُ وَالشُّكْرُ
enWisdom: Verily the servant is [always] between blessing and sin, [and] nothing rectifies [or improves] them except repentance and gratitude
A sinner who confesses his sin is better than the obedient one who is proud of his action

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَقْنَطُ وَمَعَهُ النَّجَاةُ وَهُوَ الِاسْتِغْفَارُ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who loses hope while he has with him salvation in the form of repentance

Wisdom: مَنْ أُعْطِيَ الِاسْتِغْفَارَ لَمْ يُحْرَمِ الْمَغْفِرَةَ
enWisdom: One who has been granted [the opportunity to seek] repentance shall not be deprived of forgiveness
One who seeks forgiveness from Allah attains absolution
What a good means [of gaining the pleasure of Allah] seeking forgiveness is!
There is no intercessor more successful than repentance
